Sentencas: Sealant is used in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack to separate fuel and oxygen from burning with each other throughout the stack's lifetime cycle.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Various sealing materials have been developed and the glass sealant shows quite a potential for its low leaking rate.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, glass sealants usually suffer from fractures during thermal cycle because of their low-temperature brittleness and mismatched coefficient of thermal expansion.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Recently, we have developed a novel glass-based sealant consisting of BaOCaO-SiO2-CoO and a small amount of Al2O3 powder which is used to adjust the coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) and reinforce its mechanical performance.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The sealant exhibited a good performance with the leaking rates less than 0.04 sccm cm(-1) under compressive load of 0.17 MPa at 750 degrees C and showed stable leak rates over several thermal cycles.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The well bonded interfaces and chemical compatibility have been identified by microstructure analysis of the seals.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The sealant also demonstrated its applicability in a one-cell stack test.
Titulo: Evaluation and Application of a Novel BaO-CaO-SiO2-CoO-B2O3 Based Glass-Ceramic Sealing Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
